2.subtask_description: Search GitHub for repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization.

1.handles: Searches for GitHub repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization.

input_vars.name: repo_query
input_vars.description: Search query for GitHub repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization.

output_vars.name: weather_repos
output_vars.description: List of GitHub repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization.

2.handles: Refines the search query or gathers additional information about weather-related GitHub repositories.

input_vars.name: ask_messages
input_vars.description: Array of conversation messages to refine the search query or gather additional information.
input_vars.value: [{"role": "user", "content": "Find GitHub repositories related to weather data analysis or visualization."}]

output_vars.name: refined_repo_info
output_vars.description: Refined information about weather-related GitHub repositories from Perplexity_ask.
output_vars.value:
```json

        "repository": "reecebaileyy/Weather-Data-Analysis",
    ```
